p.name: Shadowstep
p.description: Shadowreaver's passive ability, which causes him to blink to any enemy champion he recently attacked.

q.name: Shadow Strike
q.description: Shadowreaver dashes forward, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies hit.

w.name: Shadow Veil
w.description: Shadowreaver creates a veil of shadow, granting himself and nearby allies bonus attack speed and movement speed.

e.name: Shadow Bind
e.description: Shadowreaver binds the enemy in shadows, rooting them and dealing magic damage over time.

r.name: Shadowrift
r.description: Shadowreaver creates a rift in the shadows, dealing magic damage and launching enemies hit into the air.

p.name: Gift of the Ancients
p.description: Aurelia's passive ability, which grants her bonus mana regeneration per second.

q.name: Arcane Bolt
q.description: Aurelia launches a bolt of magical energy, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies in a line.

w.name: Mana Shield
w.description: Aurelia creates a shield of magical energy around her, granting her bonus armour and magic resist.

e.name: Arcane Barrier
e.description: Aurelia creates a wall of arcane energy, blocking enemy projectiles and granting allies who pass through it bonus armour and magic resist.

r.name: Celestial Wrath
r.description: Aurelia calls forth a comet from the heavens, dealing magic damage and disarming enemies in the area.

p.name: Fuego
p.description: Ignis' passive ability, which causes her abilities to leave burning afterlanes on the ground and deal bonus damage to enemies who stand in them.

q.name: Scorch
q.description: Ignis launches a bolt of fire, dealing magic damage and setting the target ablaze.

w.name: Wall of Flames
w.description: Ignis creates a wall of fire at the target location, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies who pass through it.

e.name: Enkindle
e.description: Ignis emits a pulse of fire around her, dealing magic damage and increasing her movement speed.

r.name: The Burning Tyrant
r.description: Ignis releases a blazing wave of fire, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies in the area.

p.name: Spikes
p.description: Thorn's passive ability, which causes her basic attacks to deal bonus physical damage.

q.name: Thorn Shot
q.description: Thorn fires a shot that explodes on impact, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies in the area.

w.name: Brambles
w.description: Thorn plants brambles at the target location, dealing physical damage and rooting enemies hit.

e.name: Shield Bash
e.description: Thorn charges forward, dealing physical damage and stunning enemies in her path.

r.name: Canopy of Thorns
r.description: Thorn creates a canopy of thorns at the target location, dealing physical damage and damaging all enemies caught in the area.

p.name: Burning Rage
p.description: Blazing Fury's passive ability, which causes his basic attacks and abilities to deal bonus fire damage to enemies around him when he is in combat.

q.name: Fireball
q.description: Blazing Fury launches a fireball at his enemies, dealing magic damage and burning those in the target area.

w.name: Fire Shield
w.description: Blazing Fury surrounds himself with a shield of fire, granting him bonus armor and magic resist.

e.name: Fire Burst
e.description: Blazing Fury creates a burst of fire in a line, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies hit.

r.name: Inferno
r.description: Blazing Fury unleashes an inferno in a large area, dealing magic damage and disorienting enemies.

p.name: Dual Nature
p.description: RadiantEclipse's passive ability, which grants her bonus attack and spell damage when she lands a basic attack or abilities.

q.name: Eclipse Sweep
q.description: RadiantEclipse sweeps her scythe in a circle, dealing physical damage and charging her scythe with energy.

w.name: Solar Beam
w.description: RadiantEclipse releases a beam of solar energy in a line, dealing magic damage and charging her scythe with energy.

e.name: Lunarsquall
e.description: RadiantEclipse blasts enemies with a squall of lunar energy, dealing magic damage and charging her scythe with energy.

r.name: Supernova
r.description: RadiantEclipse unleashes a supernova of energy, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies in the area.

p.name: Crystalline Skin
p.description: Azureth's passive ability, which grants her bonus armor and magic resistance for each nearby enemy champion.

q.name: Crystal Cone
q.description: Azureth casts a cone of crystalline energy, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies in the area.

w.name: Crystal Shield
w.description: Azureth creates a shield of crystalline energy, granting her bonus armor and magic resist.

e.name: Crystal Slash
e.description: Azureth slashes at her enemies with her crystalline blades, dealing magic damage and reducing their armor.

r.name: Crystal Nova
r.description: Azureth unleashes a blast of crystalline energy, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies in the area.

p.name: Celestial Gift
p.description: Elysium's passive ability, which grants her bonus health and mana when she is out of combat.

q.name: Celestial Shield
q.description: Elysium creates a shield of light around herself, granting her bonus armor and magic resist.

w.name: Celestial Strike
w.description: Elysium fires a bolt of light, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies in the area.

e.name: Celestial Grace
e.description: Elysium grants an ally bonus health and mana regeneration.

r.name: Celestial Surge
r.description: Elysium serves a surge of energy, dealing magic damage in a line and silencing enemies hit.

p.name: Shadow Step
p.description: Shadowblade's passive ability, which grants him bonus movement speed whenever he is out of combat.

q.name: Shadow Slash
q.description: Shadowblade slashes with a shadow blade, dealing physical damage and marking enemies.

w.name: Shadow Veil
w.description: Shadowblade cloaks himself in shadows, becoming invisible and gaining bonus movement speed.

e.name: Shadow Dash
e.description: Shadowblade dashes forward, dealing magic damage and silencing enemies in the area.

r.name: Shadow Strike
r.description: Shadowblade launches a wave of shadows in a line, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies hit.

p.name: Wind Walker
p.description: Zephyr's passive ability, which grants him bonus movement speed when he is out of combat.

q.name: Wind Blast
q.description: Zephyr blasts a gust of wind in a line, dealing magic damage and knocking enemies back.

w.name: Wind Shield
w.description: Zephyr creates a shield of wind around himself, granting him bonus armor and magic resist.

e.name: Wind Wall
e.description: Zephyr creates a wall of wind, blocking enemy projectiles and slowing enemies who pass through it.

r.name: Tornado
r.description: Zephyr summons a tornado at the target location, dealing magic damage and knocking up enemies in the area.

p.name: Blood Well
p.description: Aatrox's passive ability, which grants him bonus life steal when he hits enemies with his attacks and abilities.

q.name: Dark Flight
q.description: Aatrox takes flight, dealing magic damage and knocking enemies in the target area airborne.

w.name: Blood Price
w.description: Aatrox marks an enemy for death, taking on his enemies' damage and dealing magical damage and healing himself.

e.name: Massacre
e.description: Aatrox cleaves the enemy, dealing physical damage and damaging nearby enemies.

r.name: World Ender
r.description: Aatrox slams down his weapon, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies in an area.

p.name: Unyielding Courage
p.description: Valiant's passive ability, which grants him bonus attack speed when he activates his abilities.

q.name: Shield Bash
q.description: Valiant slams forward with his shield, dealing physical damage to enemies in front of him and stunning them.

w.name: Defensive Stance
w.description: Valiant takes a defensive stance, granting him bonus armor and magic resist and reducing the damage he takes.

e.name: Rally Cry
e.description: Valiant puts out a rallying cry, increasing his allies' movement speed and giving them bonus attack speed.

r.name: Charge of Valor
r.description: Valiant charges forward, dealing physical damage to enemies in front of him and knocking them back.

p.name: Mystic Link
p.description: Mystic's passive ability, which causes her spells to echo, dealing bonus damage when cast on an ally.

q.name: Mystic Bolt
q.description: Mystic fires a bolt of energy forward, dealing magic damage and slowing the target.

w.name: Mystic Ward
w.description: Mystic summons a ward of energy around her, increasing her health regeneration for a duration.

e.name: Mystic Chain
e.description: Mystic chains her target, dealing magic damage and pulling them towards her.

r.name: Mystic Shield
r.description: Mystic shields an ally, granting them bonus armor and magic resist for a duration.

p.name: Rising Spell Force
p.description: Ezreal's passive ability, which empowers his next attack with bonus attack damage and increases his attack speed.

q.name: Mystic Shot
q.description: Ezreal fires a magical bolt, dealing physical damage to the first unit it hits and reducing its armor.

w.name: Essence Flux
w.description: Ezreal sends out a wave of energy, dealing magic damage and restoring mana to himself and allies hit.

e.name: Arcane Shift
e.description: Ezreal teleports to a nearby location, dealing magic damage and dealing bonus damage to the first enemy it hits.

r.name: Trueshot Barrage
r.description: Ezreal fires a massive missile in a line, dealing massive physical damage to enemies in its path.

p.name: Time Warp
p.description: Pulsefire's passive ability, which grants him bonus attack speed when he is near allied champions.

q.name: Time Bomb
q.description: Pulsefire throws out a time bomb that sticks to an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing them.

w.name: Time Warp
w.description: Pulsefire channels a time warp, granting himself and nearby allies bonus movement speed.

e.name: Rewind
e.description: Pulsefire rewinds time, allowing himself and his allies to restore some of the cooldowns of their abilities.

r.name: Time Lock
r.description: Pulsefire locks enemies in time, stunning them and dealing magical damage.

p.name: Resonance
p.description: Participant 1's passive ability, which causes his basic attacks and abilities to restore a portion of mana on hit.

q.name: Shockwave
q.description: Participant 1 strikes the ground, creating a shockwave that deals magic damage and knocks enemies back.

w.name: Spectral Barrier
w.description: Participant 1 summons a barrier of spectral energy, granting him and nearby allies bonus armor and magic resist.

e.name: Phase Shift
e.description: Participant 1 phases out of reality, becoming invisible and untargetable for a few seconds.

r.name: Reality Rip
r.description: Participant 1 tears a rift in reality, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies in the area.

p.name: Kali's Wrath
p.description: Kali's passive ability, which grants her bonus attack damage and attack speed when she kills or assists in a kill.

q.name: Blade Storm
q.description: Kali throws out a flurry of blades, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies in the area.

w.name: Vengeful Strike
w.description: Kali performs a spinning strike, dealing physical damage and rooting enemies in the area.

e.name: Piercing Blades
e.description: Kali throws out a barrage of blades, dealing physical damage in a cone.

r.name: Blade Fury
r.description: Kali goes into a state of uncontrollable rage, temporarily gaining bonus attack speed and bonus movement speed.

p.name: Radiant Shield
p.description: Participant 3's passive ability, which grants him bonus armor and magic resist for every enemy champion nearby.

q.name: Mystic Blast
q.description: Participant 3 sends out a blast of magical energy, dealing magic damage and silencing enemies in the area.

w.name: Reflective Shield
w.description: Participant 3 creates a shield that reflects incoming basic attacks, dealing damage back to enemies that attack him.

e.name: Mana Siphon
e.description: Participant 3 launches a bolt of energy at an enemy, dealing magic damage and draining away a portion of their mana.

r.name: Dimensional Rift
r.description: Participant 3 opens a portal, allowing him to teleport a target ally to his location and granting them bonus health and mana regen.

p.name: Sleeping Giant
p.description: Participant 4's passive ability, which grants him bonus damage after not taking damage for a few seconds.

q.name: Shockwave
q.description: Participant 4 slams the ground, dealing magic damage and knocking up enemies in the target area.

w.name: Stone Armor
w.description: Participant 4 encases himself in stone, granting him bonus armor and immunity to crowd control effects.

e.name: Boulder Toss
e.description: Participant 4 grabs an enemy and throws them, dealing physical damage and stunning them.

r.name: Earthquake
r.description: Participant 4 slams the ground, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies in the area.

p.name: Mark of the Wild
p.description: Participant 5's passive ability, which causes his basic attacks and abilities to leave a mark that empowers nearby allies.

q.name: Wild Bolt
q.description: Participant 5 launches a bolt of wild energy, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies hit.

w.name: Wild Shield
w.description: Participant 5 creates a shield of wild energy, granting bonus armor and magic resist to allies in the area.

e.name: Wild Surge
e.description: Participant 5 unleashes a surge of wild energy, dealing magic damage and pushing enemies in the target area away.

r.name: Wild Fury
r.description: Participant 5 calls down a storm of wild energy, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies in the area.

p.name: Dragon's Breath
p.description: Dragonfire's passive ability, which grants him bonus attack damage when he uses his basic attacks.

q.name: Fire Blast
q.description: Dragonfire blasts a wave of fire in a line, dealing magic damage and burning enemies in the area.

w.name: Heat Shield
w.description: Dragonfire creates a shield of heat around himself, granting him bonus armor and magic resist.

e.name: Fire Wall
e.description: Dragonfire creates a wall of fire, damaging and knocking enemies back.

r.name: Inferno
r.description: Dragonfire summons a massive inferno at the target location, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies in the area.

p.name: Surprise Attacker
p.description: Birthday Surprise's passive ability, which grants her bonus attack speed when she is near an ally.

q.name: Raining Gifts
q.description: Birthday Surprise showers her target with a stream of presents, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies hit.

w.name: Wrapping Paper
w.description: Birthday Surprise wraps her target in wrapping paper, granting them bonus armor and magic resist.

e.name: Balloon Wave
e.description: Birthday Surprise summons a wave of balloons, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies in the area.

r.name: Grand Finale
r.description: Birthday Surprise creates a celebratory explosion, dealing magic damage and granting allies bonus movement speed.

p.name: Energy Absorption
p.description: Unique_champion's passive ability, which grants him bonus ability power whenever he absorbs energy from enemies.

q.name: Energy Beam
q.description: Unique_champion fires a beam of energy, dealing magic damage and temporarily reducing the armor and magic resist of enemies hit.

w.name: Energy Shield
w.description: Unique_champion creates a shield of energy around himself, granting him bonus armor and magic resist.

e.name: Energy Pulse
e.description: Unique_champion releases a burst of energy, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies in the target area.

r.name: Energy Surge
r.description: Unique_champion unleashes a surge of energy, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies in the area.

p.name: Unstoppable
p.description: Victory's passive ability, which grants her bonus movement speed when entering combat.

q.name: Pyrric Charge
q.description: Victory charges forward, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies hit.

w.name: Victory's Shield
w.description: Victory creates a shield around her, granting her bonus armor and magic resist.

e.name: War Cry
e.description: Victory lets out a powerful cry that grants all nearby allies bonus movement speed and attack speed.

r.name: Crown of Victory
r.description: Victory summons a crown of triumph at the target location, granting her nearby allies bonus armor and magic resist.

p.name: Monarch's Blessing
p.description: Monarch's passive ability, which causes her basic attacks to restore a small amount of health to her allies.

q.name: Sacred Strike
q.description: Monarch strikes a target with a holy bolt of energy, dealing magic damage and slowing them.

w.name: Protective Shield
w.description: Monarch creates a shield around an ally, granting them bonus armor and magic resist.

e.name: Hymn of Protection
e.description: Monarch summons a protective hymn, reducing the damage enemies deal to allies in the area.

r.name: Divine Wrath
r.description: Monarch channels divine energy, dealing magic damage and silencing enemies in the area.
